name: BoundPunch Prototype
description:
Hello and welcome to the BoundPunch game page ! 

This game is a Prototype for a small game were you punch your way out of your workplace.

First of all, thanks for trying it out ! 

Now about the controls:
Movement controls : Keyboard: ZQSD - Controller: Left Joystick
Punch/Interact : Keyboard: Spacebar - Controller: A
